EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for She's Pivotal: Transforming Who’s Building The World’s Software! Please see event details below:
Date & Time: Thursday, June 9th, 8:30 AM - 4:00 PM Location: T-Rex <[[http://downtowntrex.com/]]>, 911 Washington Avenue, St. Louis, MO 63101
Breakfast and Lunch will be provided.
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact us via email at rhoffman@pivotal.io <[[mailto:rhoffman@pivotal.io]]>.
